belongs_to_collection.name: キン肉マン シリーズ

original_title: キン肉マン 決戦!7人の正義超人vs宇宙野武士
overview: A TV Special first aired in 1984. It covers the Planet Rakka story arc and takes place after the 21st Choujin Olympics Arc. A young boy from Planet Rakka named Beansman asks Kinnikuman and the others to help save his planet from the Space Samurais led by Black King. The story was a parody of The Seven Samurai.
title: Kinnikuman: Showdown! The Seven Justice Supermen vs. The Space Samurais
